review: Not very good. Works with Amazon Prime but not with anything else! Roku works much better!!!!
author: Norseman

review: I like it so far.  works perfect and quality is great.  picture quality is awesome.  My only criticism is that I thought it would do more.  Obviously it is my fault for not fully researching this item.  I was going to give it four stars for this reason, however I can only blame myself.  It is priced very well and it does what it states that it does.  This is a five star product.  I must say thank you amazon!
author: cngodfather

review: Quite impressed with the features of the little Fire TV stick. No lags, no delays, performs as expected and best of all, I have access to all Prime content on my TV!
author: NadimC

review: I was amazed at what was availible to watch and the clear digital picture.
author: WAYNE R. AUPPERLE

review: The installation was simple. Installed You Tube in minutes. Couldn't be easier to use.
author: Ed from Bay Ridge

review: Awesome addition to my digital collection.  Easy to setup and prefer over Apple TV which does allow me access to my Prime membership.  We worth the low cost.
author: Timothy Kilpatrick

review: So easy! Plug it in, go through the setup and enjoy.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Needs Vudu and CBS All Access, but I am otherwise satisfied.  Zippy for a media stick.  Replaced my Chromecast.
author: Bradley Olinger
